title: Filter to cause sediment deposition around a storm sewer inlet

claims.preamble: The ornamental design of a filter to cause sediment deposition around a storm sewer inlet, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a perspective view of a filter to cause sediment deposition around a storm sewer inlet showing my new design;
FIG. 2 is a side view thereof;
FIG. 3 is a top view thereof;
FIG. 4 is a bottom view thereof; and,
FIG. 5 is a cross-sectional view taken along the line 5—5 in FIG. 3.
The cross-line pattern, which is partially shown for ease of illustration, represents a conventional fabric and is understood to repeat uniformly throughout the indicated area.
